app_description: The EC EDR App is an essential tool designed to ensure a smooth and transparent election process by enabling the public to report election-related complaints and requests efficiently. This user-friendly app allows citizens to submit their concerns directly, ensuring that election-related issues are addressed promptly and fairly
Login to quickly report and track your c: Log in to report and track your complaints
name: Name
Welcome Back! Glad to see you: Welcome Back! Glad to see you
An SMS has been sent. Please check your: An SMS has been sent. Please check your mobile and complete the OTP
password_reset_success_description: Password reset successfully. You’ll be redirected to the login screen now

language_description: Select the language to get started
Didn't receive the code…? Resend Code: Didn't receive the code…? Resend Code
Choose whether you want to file a compla:
Choose whether you want to file a complain or make a request to ensure your concerns are handled appropriately. Selecting the correct option helps us address your issue more effectively and provide a timely resolution. 
Let us know how we can help!
Title: Title

How to Add New Complaint: How to add a new complaint
help_question_2: 2. How to add a new request
help_question_3: 3. View the latest complaint or request

add_complaint.title: 1 .How to Add New Complaint
add_complaint.home_tap: - On the home screen, tap on Add Complaint or Request tab
add_complaint.submit: - Get photos/videos or you can skip..
add_complaint.submits: - Fill in the complaint details (e.g., title, description).
add_complaint.submits1: - Submit the form. You will receive a reference number for tracking.

add_request.title: 2 .How to Add a New Request
add_request.tap: - Fill in the request details (e.g., title, description).
add_request.fill_details: - If you want, you can attach a file, but it's not compulsory.

review_complaints.title: 3. Review Latest Complaints/Requests
review_complaints.navigate: - Go to the home screen, tap on Latest Complaint/Request section.
review_complaints.find1: - View the status and details of the complaint/Request..

change_language_logout.title: 5 .How to Change Language and Logout
change_language_logout.language: - Select Language to change the app’s language.
change_language_logout.logout: - To log out, go to the Settings menu and tap on Logout..

Complaint and Request History View.title: 4 .Complaint and Request History View
Complaint and Request History View.find: - View a list of all your past complaints and requests.
Complaint and Request History View.find1: -Tap on any entry to see detailed information and status

Thank.title: Thank you for using the Election Commission of Sri Lanka App!For any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

checkpassword.step1: Password must contain at least 8 characters

statusdis.NEW: Your complaint/request has been successfully received by the Election Commission, and it is now being processed for further action
statusdis.POLICE: Your complaint has been forwarded to the Sri Lanka Police for necessary action.
